posts.post_title: FS: Shaw Piedmont 350 Elite 11 Poor Condition
posts.post_content: I have an Al Shaw Piedmont 350 for sale. The card is in poor condition with ink marking as shown in the photos. Please PM me with any questions or for additional photos. SOLD Please include $5.95 for USPS Priority 3-Day shipping.
Bump with change in asking price.
